website_summaries.verdict: A reliable pair of ramps with a significant arch for easy loading.
pros: These two ramps are easy to use, fold up well, and look great
The aluminum is sturdy and solidly welded
1,500-pound capacity between the 2 ramps and combined weight of 34.7 pounds
Each ramp measures 79 inches long and 12 inches wide
cons: Slightly heavier than other ramps, making these more difficult to carry

customer_reviews.title: Light, sturdy and do the job
customer_reviews.text: These ramps are fantastic. I use them to get my zero turn in and out of my shed, and since the tires are offset I was looking for something wide enough to fit front and rear tires so I wouldn't have to do precision driving every time so I don't fall off the ramps. They do a perfect job and make getting in and out a breeze. Really light as well and easy to move around without breaking your back. I don't use the straps for my shed, but used them to try getting my mower into a a pickup which worked just fine with this length on a 1500 truck. They are very sturdy with only light flexing.
customer_reviews.author: Hellride

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight Utility Ramp
customer_reviews.text: I just love it. This is a strong, lightweight, but nicely designed ramp (aesthetically beautiful). It fits behind the driver's seat when folds, but unfold its 7.5 feet helps to ease the effort to load or unload equipment from my F150 truck. From generators wirh their wheels to freezers with a hand truck its been a blessing to have this asset. This tool has been useful for us in moments of disgrace as victims of hurricane Maria moving people, equipment and tools. Moreover, I believe that every truck owner must consider have ramps like those in their vehicles, house or work.
customer_reviews.author: J J Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Very slippery
customer_reviews.text: These are by no means a perfect set of ramps. I attempted to load my bike, a 2006 warrior, and it was not able to get into my pickup with how slippery these were. I'm lucky the bike did not slide off of them because it threatened to multiple times. I would definitely go for a better and wider ramp for motorcycles. I was however able to load a lawn tractor using a ditch to even it out.
customer_reviews.author: donald

customer_reviews.title: Great Ramps, head and shoulders above wood ramps.
customer_reviews.text: These are great. They are light weight and work fantastic. Getting my ATV on the truck is really easy. I use the winch to load without me on it, but could easily ride up these without a problem (WAY better than the boards I was using). I really like the straps that are included as well. First time I used the ramps it was after my truck got stuck. Without the straps, I would not have been able to get the ATV off safely since we were on an incline. The straps kept the ramps from falling off. Very happy about this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin R. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: They are light and durable and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: They are light and durable and easy to use. I and 5’4” and and easily set up and pushed my lawn mower to my truck. But the reason I gave 4 stars is they do not build the same so when I put both ramp side by side one is higher than the other. Despite I can use, so I decided to keep them and not returning. But I just want future people who want to buy know that they are good quality but not perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Not a Lawnmower
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Good construction. However, on level ground my riding lawnmower got stuck trying to get in the bed of a 2015 Tundra Double Cab. I needed to reposition the truck so the ramps would be higher in relation to the tailgate.
customer_reviews.author: K. Kadzielawski

customer_reviews.title: I shopped awhile first
customer_reviews.text: I shopped before buying these and I am glad to have found these. They are just what I needed for use with our horse trailer if I want to haul something other than horses like our riding mower, or motorcycles, or 4 wheeler. I feel safe using these too.
customer_reviews.author: I. M. Listening

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, supports me on a golf cart
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to load my golf cart in the back of my truck. They work well and I like that they fold up to save space. Due to how steep they are, I recommend loading something with low clearance like a golf cart where the cart is sitting in an area sitting higher than ground level (truck bed leaning down some) if that makes sense.
customer_reviews.author: J. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Build quality is not so great
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the ramps so I could use them to load my lawn mowers on to my truck, but one of the ramps is missing a weld. It seems there isn't any quality control when manufacturing these. Hopefully the replacement doesn't have the same issue. I wouldn't want to use it like that and all of the sudden it snaps and there goes my equipment down to the ground. Maybe I just received a defective ramp?
customer_reviews.author: Edgar H

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality control.
customer_reviews.text: I've just returned these ramps because they arrived banged up looking and with very sloppy and slipshod looking welds. Some of the welds were attempting to join pieces of metal that had over a 3/4 inch gap between them. Terrible quality.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: These are well made and very affordable.
customer_reviews.text: These ramps are great. They are 7 1/2 feet and fold in half for easy handling and storage. They come with two nylon straps so you can connect them to the d rings in the truck bed. The ramps are wide enough for most lawn tractors as well. I use these for my mower since I just had hernia surgery and makes loading so easy now. Nice !
customer_reviews.author: Rich Dickhart

customer_reviews.title: Wish it was more heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Be careful of making sure it stays in place when loading. Not very heavy duty, wish someone made a higher capacity one, would like a bigger safety margin. ALso wish it was 9 feet long
customer_reviews.author: Garry Luterek

customer_reviews.title: Excellent ramps!
customer_reviews.text: Loading ZX10R (450 lbs) into F150 was incredibly easy with this pair of ramps. Ramps weigh 13 lbs, or so, no real challenge to use, flat plats make rolling vehicle up them incredibly easy, was amazed! Stowing in box or back floor simple and easy, light weight helps.
customer_reviews.author: Per Wiatrow

customer_reviews.title: Light weight, Perfect for Golf Cart, riding mower
customer_reviews.text: Attractive, light weight, easy to move, folds small enough to fit into my trunk, strong enough to easily support my 600 lb Golf Cart, Curved ramp a bonus for loading items with a long wheelbase. Tie down straps included. PERFECT.
customer_reviews.author: Robert in Ohio

customer_reviews.title: Watch for little burs on this
customer_reviews.text: Watch for little burs on this. Got it to load and unload my snowblower from the bed of my pickup. I have a large snow blower and getting around in the truck was a pain in the butter. These ramps are light enough and also strong enough for the job. Wear gloves for the little burs. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: DAH

customer_reviews.title: Acceptable.
customer_reviews.text: Overall seems like they get the job done. Has some sharp edges that will cut you if not careful. Other Thoughts: Not the fault of these ramps, but I have a 3/4 ton truck and the ramps are a little too short for most of what I would want them for. They'll work in a pinch but loading with them isn't "easy."
customer_reviews.author: Harley

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: This was a nice good quality product the reason for four stars is because we could not get the riding lawn mower into the back of the pickup due to the Steep incline because these were too short
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Heim

customer_reviews.title: Big and heavy and hard to move but gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: These are big and heavy and hard to move. I wish they had some type of handle on them and also a way to latch the two halves together, but I am forced to give 5 stars because they do exactly what they are supposed to do, and they are very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: TINETQL

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: We have a 42" Deere mower that needed to go from my yard to my brothers(across the driveway) Borrowing the neighbors smaller ramps was a chore. Bought these 7.5' ramps and BOOM! Up and over my back deck to his yard was easy!!! Highly recommended!!!
customer_reviews.author: I think I’m a robot

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Ramps-great price
customer_reviews.text: Seem to be exactly as advertised. Welds look good and folds and opens nicely. Appears to be an excellent buy. I have used them a couple of times and would not hesitate to recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Forrest Nutter

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Ramps are good quality and work fine. I use them for loading mowers and 55 gallon drums using a drum dolly. Would get a heavier/wider set for ATV’s
customer_reviews.author: MJM

customer_reviews.title: Damages mower decks
customer_reviews.text: I have an F-150 truck and riding lawn mower. When offloading from the back of the truck, the mower deck catches the ramp tread plating and rips the ramp plating off. This weekend when offloading mower, the ramp deck plating caught the mower deck and severely bent the mower deck which I had to bend back with a hammer. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Chris paradee

customer_reviews.title: using to load a utv lots of flex not sure ...
customer_reviews.text: using to load a utv lots of flex not sure it will be with us after a few more trips
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: Dont no why I waited so long to get a set of these, much better than the 8ft wood ones I was using.
customer_reviews.author: Scott T. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Long enough for easy loading/unloading. Fold short enough to easily store in a short bed or fit on the roof rack.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Straeter

customer_reviews.title: Would highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This product is light, but made out of a quality aluminum. Extremely easy to load my Harley in the bed of my truck before Hurricane Florence and made the job doable by myself. Had zero problems with the ramp slipping off the bed of the truck with the inlcuded straps and the ramp itself provided plenty of traction since I had to load in the rain.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Mendes

customer_reviews.title: They fold in half
customer_reviews.text: The only small problem is that one folded out completely and the other I had to file down a cross bar to get it to fold out completely. However, the perform very well because of the aggressive hole placement on the ramps for traction.
customer_reviews.author: Grandpa John

customer_reviews.title: Good Sturdy Mower Ramps
customer_reviews.text: Folding ramps a perfect for the pitch to my lawn shed. The riding mower drives up into shed without draging deck and backout is smooth. I like the lightweight ramps for folding and easy storage.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Raymer

customer_reviews.title: I recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I used these all summer to load and unload 4wheelers into my pickup for farming purchases. The only con is you have to make sure they are spaced properly for the tires. The arch in the ramps made loading into my taller pickup easy, and did not turn it into a motorcross freestyle even like traditional straight ramps tend to do.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Fiasco

customer_reviews.title: Light weight, sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Great for the money! They support my 100+ lbs machine along with my 200+ lbs chunk with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin1772

customer_reviews.title: Good motorcycle ramp
customer_reviews.text: I got the set so I could walk up the second one. My truck is lifted and I find riding up a ramp over my pay grade.
customer_reviews.author: Marc F.

customer_reviews.title: Great for carts, need some work on hands...
customer_reviews.text: Just a little unrefined. Sharp corners and lots of small burrs along the straight parts on the Aluminum. Needs a few minutes with some sandpaper. Overall the ramp handles the weight of my carts very well, loading uphill or downhill into my vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: T. Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Hard to believe they will hold the capacity stated. Nice and light. Many sharp edges. Be careful
customer_reviews.author: JG44070

customer_reviews.title: Really good and portable
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this ramp is excellent. It's fairly light and it FOLDS, which to me was the selling point. I bought it to use with an electric wheelchair. I had to cut the square footings to make it laid more flesh to the ground. This makes the loading of the wheelchair much faster.
customer_reviews.author: R. Suarez

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy and Flexible
customer_reviews.text: For a small and lightweight dirt bike this is fine, for a 500lb plus road bike forget it.
customer_reviews.author: Margin of Safety

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Loved them. Very sturdy. Was hoping they would be curved down a little more than what they are.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I load my Yamaha golf cart with these with no strain on them. Nice and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Burt

customer_reviews.title: Flimsey
customer_reviews.text: Pretty flimsy but did do what I needed. I would not recommend it for anything to heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Lanny Taylor

customer_reviews.title: very pleased with quality and versatility
customer_reviews.text: Well built, worked well, very pleased with quality and versatility.
customer_reviews.author: DONALD D. HARMON

customer_reviews.title: Could not be more happy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for loading my ATV into the bed of my F150. The folding design makes for perfect storage and transport.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great ramps.. Light weight, easy to mount, and easily supports the weight of a fully gassed ATV.
customer_reviews.author: nbiron

customer_reviews.title: GREAT ramps!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent ramps for the price! Very versatile and easy to use and store.
customer_reviews.author: DarylScience

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight good quality
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and lightweight. Have used to mount tractor on pick up and to move a 700 pound bike. Worked like a charm
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Salas

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, long, durable. It's a great ramp.
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommended, used for loading several things, always works great
customer_reviews.author: trevor shirriffs

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not as strong as expected..
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something I felt safe using. Being that they are rated at higher weight than other ramps, they still flex downward when loading my 800 pound mower on them. So far they are holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Benji

customer_reviews.title: NOT SUITABLE FOR MY TRACTOR MOWER
customer_reviews.text: These were advertised as suitable for tractor mowers. They are NOT suitable for my standard John Deer 130. 48 inch mower. On loading it grounded out. The curve at the top is not enough to allow normal loading. Very disappointed. I had to back up to a ramp to load up.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald A Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Got these for loading the ATV on the trail, they work great, just don't understand why they waist the money for the plastic red pieces they cracked the first use. Other than that they are great, light weight and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: These ramps work great, wish I bought them years ago!
customer_reviews.author: Slacker554

customer_reviews.title: 7.5 ft aluminum Ramps work well for garden tractor
customer_reviews.text: The 7.5 ft ramps worked well getting my garden tractor into my pick-up truck. They are well made and sturdy. I am sure I will get many years of use from these ramps.
customer_reviews.author: CHTX

customer_reviews.title: A great buy and super light weight
customer_reviews.text: These were $80 cheaper than any other ramps I could find locally! A great buy and super light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Kuhn

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Well made product - Haven't had a chance to really test them yet, but look very well made and durable. Good price and fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great ramps. Work awesome. Great for my Harley as it has a low clearance.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Margott

customer_reviews.title: Light weight & easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. Light weight, easy to use, used on "suishy ground" and the base never moved. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: T.  Peterman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are lightweight and the curved design makes loading and unloading much easier!😊
customer_reviews.author: HB

customer_reviews.title: Great ramps
customer_reviews.text: Really well made ramps Just what I needed I would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works fine.
customer_reviews.text: I use it to load my Yamaha atv on pickup, it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: pat siharath

customer_reviews.title: worked good to load a golf cart in the bed of ...
customer_reviews.text: worked good to load a golf cart in the bed of a dually with the help of wooden ramp to decrease the angle.
customer_reviews.author: spend it now or later

customer_reviews.title: Now I can take my motorcycle and my truck everyday.
customer_reviews.text: Easily held up to my 600lb motorcycle, convenient and light. Now I can load my bike into my truck by myself in under two mintues.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are light weight makes loading my golf cart on the trailer easier to go camping.
customer_reviews.author: MimiA

customer_reviews.title: ... this for my electric wheel chair and it works wonderful for my van also my son can use to ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my electric wheel chair and it works wonderful for my van also my son can use to load his at in truck yes I would buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Erwin G.

customer_reviews.title: Great ramps
customer_reviews.text: These are very well built ramps, yet light and easy to fold. The ratchet strap is OK but it isn't very functional to latching the ramps to a trailer.
customer_reviews.author: L. Linnell

customer_reviews.title: Great items. My JD went up it like it ...
customer_reviews.text: Great items. My JD went up it like it was supposed to and that is what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Happy

customer_reviews.title: Work great!! A+
customer_reviews.text: There are great!! I was very surprised at how cheap they are and on prime. VERY HAPPY!!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Allen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use and is nice and sturdy. Boyfriend loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Great rams, works well with my four wheeler and ...
customer_reviews.text: Great rams ,works well with my four wheeler and riding lawn mower.
customer_reviews.author: Peter H.Vareberg

customer_reviews.title: SO LIGHT-SO WELL MADE
customer_reviews.text: Quality product. Looks good and efficient design. Perfect for what I need. Incredibly light. I would highly recommend these ramps to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: D. Wall

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and light weight. It is what I expected
customer_reviews.author: Robert M. Knott, P.E.

customer_reviews.title: Great ramps
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, easy to use. Fold almost flat for storage. Live in rural area. Got ramps to load the large trash and recycle bins into the truck to take down to the road.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Mc

customer_reviews.title: easy to use and they won't fall off the trailer ...
customer_reviews.text: For putting stuff with wheels in my trailer, these ramps work well. Not heavy, easy to use and they won't fall off the trailer when you're loading or unloading.
customer_reviews.author: Eric H.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Nice and sturdy and long enough to provide access to a trailer or pick up bed. Well built.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, can't attest to weight limits, but seems sturdy enough! Handles my motorcycle no problem!
customer_reviews.author: AJ Crader

customer_reviews.title: Not very beefy looking.
customer_reviews.text: Look nice, seemed like too much money for not very beefy built. Did the job moving my pressure washer but that is about the limit I would use for.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Stable ramps, easy on and easy off the truck!
customer_reviews.text: These ramps are perfect for my ATV, easy on and easy off without a problem. These ramps do not move and are more stable due to the way the ends sit upon the bed. Excellent ramps!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Grant

customer_reviews.title: Can be used to load a 46” Cub Cadet lawn tractor into a 2014 Ford F-150
customer_reviews.text: The best thing about the ramps is that they fold in half. This makes it much easier to store when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Roo

customer_reviews.title: Quality Ramps
customer_reviews.text: These are great. The price was reasonable and the quality acceptable. They work as described. Glad I bought them and would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: James Mcgrew

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant all around.
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty. Excellent, safe design. Extention teeth will save your bumper.
customer_reviews.author: Woodcement

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, well-packaged for delivery, relatively non-marring for the tailgate.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, well-packaged for delivery, relatively non-marring for the tailgate. The not perfect - they really should include ratchet straps in lieu of the pull type. I'm sure the others are arguably functionally equivalent, but I use ratchet style straps to really ensure it's properly secured. I find this much easier to do this way over with the provided cheap straps.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Black

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Work great so far, been most helpful loading lawn tractor and misc. other equipment.
customer_reviews.author: William Geil

customer_reviews.title: Great Item!
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight but very strong. Handles my fully loaded Ace 570 with very little flexing. VERY HAPPY!

customer_reviews.title: They are fantastic and a back saver
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the ramp product to load a snow blower, lawn mower and generator in the back of a pick up truck. They are fantastic and a back saver.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A little flimsier than I was expecting, but they seem to work well enough.

customer_reviews.title: Light and durable ramp set!
customer_reviews.text: Great ramp set! Very very light and yet super durable. We use them on the ground on a sloping bank to lower a 14' boat into the water.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great so far. Very lightweight and love how they fold in half

customer_reviews.title: Works for me.
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money and the folding feature just makes em better.

customer_reviews.text: Great light weight ramp. Easy to use and not as scary as a straight ramp when lading my ATV. Would buy again.

customer_reviews.text: I haven't tried them yet but the ramps appear very sturdy and should work as advertised. I'll be using them soon.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I had to file down a weld to get one of the ramps to work, it would no open or close all the way... After filing down the weld it is working ok and I can get the bolt in correctly. Love the product as I load my Zero turn mower in my 6' bed of my dodge ram 1500, no problem. I ride it up and down.

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend

customer_reviews.text: Upon receiving and taking it out of the box on day one. I set it up at my shed door and took my riding mower out of the shed, the ramp immediately bent beyond repair. I am mediately repackage it and sent it back to the seller. I was dissatisfied
